con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ser="http://services.trustvesta.com/MobilityUS_Service/Service">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <ser:ActDelayAuthorizeRequest>\r <!--You may enter the following 8 items in any order-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ser:AddToPDOF>?</ser:AddToPDOF>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ser:APAgreement>?</ser:APAgreement>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ser:ChargeCVN>?</ser:ChargeCVN>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ser:PromoAmount>?</ser:PromoAmount>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ser:ConsumerIP>?</ser:ConsumerIP>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ser:StoreIP>?</ser:StoreIP>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ser:StoreID>?</ser:StoreID>\r <ser:SessionKey>?</ser:SessionKey>\r </ser:ActDelayAuthorizeRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
